Login.title: Welcome to IGECO
Login.subtitle: Sign in to access your account
Login.privacyPrefix: By signing in, you accept the

points.1: Exhibitor badges will be delivered on the day of the event at the registration module individually. Remember to bring an official ID.
points.2: Badge reprints are not allowed, so keep your badge during the days of the event; otherwise, there will be an additional cost.
points.3: If you need to register more exhibitors than allowed, please contact your sales advisor.
points.4: If you need to activate the scanner service to collect data from visitors to your stand, contact your sales advisor. (This service can only be used within your stand; otherwise, the contract policies will apply).
